EnumCategory.Description: Represents types of events, which can occur with entities in Metanga.
EnumCategory.Name: EventType

EnumValue.Description: Create event, occurs when an entity is created.
EnumValue.Name: Create

EnumValue.Description: Update event, occurs when an entity is updated.
EnumValue.Name: Update

EnumValue.Description: Delete event, occurs when an entity is deleted.
EnumValue.Name: Delete
